statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_data;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_data ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment FROM customer_feedback_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_data ORDER BY feedback_date DESC, sentiment_score ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date <= '2022-03-31'
SELECT avg(sentiment_score) as avg_score FROM customer_feedback_data
SELECT customer_id, count(feedback_id) as total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 3
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(avg_response_time) AS avg_response_time FROM CustomerServiceStats GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123456' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(responses_count) AS max_responses FROM CustomerServiceStats GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, responses_count FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN CustomerServiceStats ON CustomerFeedback.customer_id = CustomerServiceStats.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, feedback_id, analysis_result FROM rpa_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, service_rating, service_date FROM customer_service ORDER BY service_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 100 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_sentiment_score, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_feedbacks >= 3;
SELECT service_date, AVG(service_rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_service GROUP BY service_date ORDER BY service_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(analysis_id) AS total_analyses FROM rpa_analysis INNER JOIN customer_feedback ON rpa_analysis.feedback_id = customer_feedback.feedback_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_analyses > 2;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT system_name, system_version FROM AutomationSystems ORDER BY system_version DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT sentiment_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM CustomerFeedback AS cf JOIN SentimentAnalysis AS sa ON cf.feedback_id = sa.feedback_id WHERE sa.sentiment_score > 0.7;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT system_name, system_version FROM AutomationSystems WHERE system_type = 'Analytics' ORDER BY system_version DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date, customer_id FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_segment FROM customer_profile ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_category = 'Positive';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, updated_feedback FROM feedback_history WHERE history_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 80;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer_profile WHERE customer_segment = 'VIP';
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_data JOIN sentiment_analysis ON feedback_data.feedback_id = sentiment_analysis.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback_history ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 5;
